## ternary variable

Performs the ternary operation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ternary: <T, R>(aPredicate: Predicate<T>, aLeft: UnaryFunction<T, R>, aRight: UnaryFunction<T, R>) => UnaryFunction<T, R>
```
